title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Skills: AI-Driven Mobile Microlearning for Adult Learner Customization

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Using an AI-based platform, learners complete over 30 personalized language tasks weekly to master 50 core expressions
Through collaboration tools, learners complete over five real-time language performance tasks with peers to enhance situational communication skills
In a microlearning environment, learners achieve over 85% learning progress via a gamified assessment system and maintain self-reflection journals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
